text: Cruces, the formal plural of crux and a Spanish word for "crosses", may refer to: *Cruces, Cuba, a town in Cuba *Cruces River, a river in Chile **Río Cruces Bridge, a bridge that crosses Cruces River *Cruces River (Puerto Rico) *Cruces, Aguada, Puerto Rico, a barrio *Cruces, Rincón, Puerto Rico, a barrio *Cruces - Gurutzeta, a neighbourhood in Barakaldo, Spain **Gurutzeta/Cruces (Metro Bilbao), metro station in that neighbourhood *Cruces (peak), highest point of the Sierra de San Vicente, Sistema Central, Spain *Las Cruces, New Mexico, United States *Vila de Cruces, a town in Galicia, Spain *Villanueva de las Cruces, a town in Andalusia, Spain ==See also== *Crux (disambiguation) *Cruce, a surname
title: Cruces
